    "sql": "SET GLOBAL GTID_PURGED='00024991-0000-0000-0000-000000024991:1-33, 000a2071-fbc5-4926-a238-2a3156340457:7844-62857222, 015b7f7b-ce69-4345-815d-91c5884d3248:5427-105339874, 031ecb6d-ce7d-4bb0-8586-da00b7379199:2344-90277507, 039c5d09-bfc1-474b-9414-82633c3a7fd1:7330-72158588, 03aac17e-265c-4481-9637-dfb3fd259bd8:5662-105368485, 0741b25b-be67-4948-beb0-ccb6c5920a36:7237-23265489, 0ccd388d-4edd-4c8e-a011-8611020dc0e9:5350-69299846, 0d3e1ddc-260f-423a-9880-0cac851c678e:11763-69898222, 0f5676df-a371-4fa2-bee2-887de8acd2b7:1845-37551943, 107f154f-3be6-494b-8434-1d32f771252b:11595-40768437, 117d27cf-74d2-44a1-b623-1b9583f18e25:2725-87126730, 16aba989-c12d-4fba-a6f9-ffd1cfb37cd0:2006-9121709, 1783650e-c87e-4473-9ef9-389eb37d940b:2166-27874787, 18b51c20-d73b-4e2f-afe5-15fe1b80d0f8:7644-84587478, 204b95c8-6260-48a9-a1a9-1000e9aabc1c:5770-83582139, 206383ea-9271-4811-bc55-da8c8880399b:457-89412644, 232b3c1c-be69-4a96-afca-8953baf13f5a:4319-109952857, 25c01ec2-5938-4249-be7c-6399b04869d8:11871-90066097, 266a72cc-a532-4f9c-9633-027969a880cd:500-62995915, 2a303f9a-445e-4c6e-924b-b246cc4312be:5417-55703962, 2c989e19-bcf4-4f46-95b0-e755fd600847:1572-9195641'; SELECT * FROM performance_schema.global_variables WHERE variable_name LIKE '%purged%'; SELECT @@global.gtid_purged;",
    "Affected Elements": "SET GLOBAL, GTID_PURGED, performance_schema.global_variables",
    "Root Cause Analysis": "The variable_value length limitation in performance_schema.global_variables table does not accommodate the maximum length of GTID_PURGED, leading to trimmed data."
}
